verses.english: And when the stars fall, scattering,
And when the seas are erupted
verses.hausa: Kuma idan tẽkuna aka facce su.

verses.english: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,
verses.hausa: Kuma idan kaburbura aka tõne su.

verses.english: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.
verses.hausa: Rai yã san abin da ya gabatar, da abin da yã jinkirtar.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
verses.english: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,
verses.hausa: Yã kai mutum! Mẽ ya rũɗe ka game da Ubangijinka, Mai karimci.

verses.english: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?
verses.hausa: Wanda Ya halitta ka sa'an nan ya daidaitã ka, Ya kuma tsakaitã ka.

verses.arabic: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.english: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.
verses.hausa: A cikin kõwace irin sũra Ya so Ya ginã ka a kanta.

verses.english: No! But you deny the Recompense.
verses.hausa: A'aha, bã haka ba, kuna ƙaryatãwa game da sakamako!

verses.english: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, a kanku, haƙiƙa akwai matsara.
Sunã sanin abin da kuke aikatãwa.

verses.english: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, mãsu ɗã'ã ga Allah, dãhir, suna cikin ni'ima.

verses.english: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, fãjirai, dãhir, sunã cikin Jahĩm.

verses.english: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,
verses.hausa: Zã su shigẽ ta a rãnar sakamako.

verses.english: And never therefrom will they be absent.
verses.hausa: Bã zã su faku daga gare ta ba.

verses.english: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
verses.hausa: Kuma mẽ ya sanar da kai abin da ake cẽ wa rẽnar sakamako?

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.english: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, mẽ ya sanar da kai abin da ake cẽ wa rãnar sakamako?

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
verses.english: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.
verses.hausa: Rãnã ce da wani rai ba ya iya mallakar kõme dõmin wani rai al'amari, a rãnar nan, ga Allah (ɗai) yake.
